author: husted
msg: Add "TODO" markers where 1.1 documentation can be added.
Add a Developers Guide portal page to link to package description,
API, and any other resources.

author: craigmcc
msg: DynaActionFormClass - When a DynaActionForm instance is first created,
initialize all properties to the initial values configured in the
<form-property> elements, similar to what calling the default reset()
method does.
Flesh out tests for DynaActionFormClass, add initial test for
DynaActionForm.
FIXME - Deal with the static collections in DynaActionFormClass when
struts.jar is in a shared class loader.
FIXME - Support a syntax for initializing array, indexed, list, and
mapped type properties in the "initial" attribute of <form-property>
elements, so that such properties can be preset with rational values.

author: craigmcc
msg: FormPropertyConfig - correct evalution of initial value for primitive
property types ("boolean", "int", and so on).  Previously, the string
representation in the "initial" property was being ignored.
FormPropertyConfig - look up the property's defining class in the thread
context class loader first, consistent with everywhere else in Struts.
Begin creation of unit tests for DynaActionForm and DynaActionFormClass.
Nowhere near completed yet.

author: husted
msg: Change "technologies" page into the preface.

author: husted
msg: Remove obsolete file.
